
Arguments of commonMacro: [$a, fool2fish, https://github.com/fool2fish]


Arguments of commonMacro: [a, b, c]



Argument of blockMacro: one
Body content: 
Block macro is called



Argument of blockMacro: two
Body content: 
Block macro is called again





Argument of local macro: $arg


Argument of local macro: food,travel,comic,...
